CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 38 In addition , the PDTP-BT film shows a large shoulder peak at 800 nm , while no shoulder peaks were observed for PDTP - DTBT and PDTP-DT2BT , indicating stronger intermolecular interaction in PDTP-BT than in the others.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

These are the only three material names mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph, I confirm that the only valid entities that clearly refer to "Material Name" are:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP-BT |
| PDTP-DTBT |
| PDTP-DT2BT |

The term "the others" in the paragraph is a reference to the previously mentioned material names, and not a separate material name itself.
